channel.title: MK Scorpion
channel.description: Ya it has nothing to do with BM: S but still. So heres my question: In the games Scorpion shoots a SPEARHEAD out of his hand right? In the movies its a freaky little animal head. Where did they get that idea from? No one else can really give me an answer so I was wondering if anyone HERE can. :freeman:
